comment: Well did not got my wish, but still happy and continue moving forward in life. So many blessings with a new day and full of opportunities!
amr:

(m / multi-sentence

                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (t / thing

                              :ARG0 ii))
                  :mod (w2 / well))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / happy-01
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :mod (s / still))
                  :op2 (c2 / continue-01

                        :ARG1 (m2 / move-01
                              :ARG1 ii
                              :ARG2 (f / forward)
                              :topic (l / life)))))
      :snt2 (b / bless-01
            :accompanier (d / day
                  :ARG1-of (n / new-01))
            :ARG1-of (f2 / fill-01
                  :ARG2 (o / opportunity))
            :quant (m3 / many
                  :degree (s2 / so))))

comment: COVID-19 vaccination first dose done! So far so good! As a leader the most important thing is the doing not the talking: wear a mask, practice social distance and vaccinate to end this pandemic times!
